ActivityMetadata.Name: ZM Update Meeting Recording Settings
ActivityMetadata.Label: ZM Update Meeting Recording Settings
ActivityMetadata.Description: Update settings applied to a meeting's [Cloud Recording](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/203741855-Cloud-Recording) **Scopes**: `recording:write:admin` `recording:write`
